verbs.description: unauthorize (third-person singular simple present unauthorizes, present participle unauthorizing, simple past and past participle unauthorized)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To disown the authority of; to repudiate.
(transitive, computing) To withdraw authorization or permissions from.
examples: This group of users includes anyone who has created a user account but either hasn't verified their account through their email or has been unauthorized by the administrator.
